h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Golden Lining Location
content: Finally, once you reach Turtle Island in the Bitter Lake in The New West, head to the right side of the island to activate the Cyan Loong fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Golden_Lining.md', within the main section titled 'Golden Lining', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Golden Lining Location'.
The content is as follows:
Finally, once you reach Turtle Island in the Bitter Lake in The New West, head to the right side of the island to activate the Cyan Loong fight.
